description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(427).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,124,0,0,0,-1).
mathematica: Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[427], 30]] (* or *) CoefficientList[Series[(20 + 21 x + 41 x^2 + 62 x^3 + 41 x^4 - 21 x^5 + 20 x^6 - x^7)/(1 - 124 x^4 + x^8), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 09 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[20,21,41,62,2521,2583,5104,7687]; [n le 8 select I[n] else 124*Self(n-4)-Self(n-8): n in [1..40]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 09 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
